org.wicketstuff.urlfragment

Interface IBookmarkableComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncContentPanel, AsyncHomePage, AsyncUrlFragmentAwarePage, AsyncUrlFragmentAwarePanel, BookmarkableAjaxButton, BookmarkableAjaxLink, CrawlableAsyncUrlFragmentAwarePage

    public interface IBookmarkableComponent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFragmentParameter(String parameterName, Object parameterValue, String delimiter)
      Deprecated. 
      void removeFragmentParameter(String parameterName)
      Deprecated. 
      void setFragmentParameter(String parameterName, Object parameterValue)
      Deprecated. 

    • Method Detail

      • setFragmentParameter

        @Deprecated
void setFragmentParameter(String parameterName,
                                   Object parameterValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the given URL fragment parameter by adding a JavaScript to the current AjaxRequestTarget.

        The parameter will be overwritten if it already exists.

        Parameters:
        parameterName - the name of your URL fragment parameter to set
        parameterValue - the value of your URL fragment parameter to set

      • addFragmentParameter

        @Deprecated
void addFragmentParameter(String parameterName,
                                   Object parameterValue,
                                   String delimiter)
        Deprecated. 

        Use the following instead: urlFragment().addParameter(parameterName, parameterValue, delimiter);

        Sets the given URL fragment parameter by adding a JavaScript to the current AjaxRequestTarget.

        The parameter will be created if it doesn't exists yet.

        The value will be appended with the specified delimiter if the parameter already exists.

        Parameters:
        parameterName - the name of your URL fragment parameter to set
        parameterValue - the value of your URL fragment parameter to set
        delimiter - the delimiter the given value will be appended with if the given parameter already exists

      • removeFragmentParameter

        @Deprecated
void removeFragmentParameter(String parameterName)
        Deprecated. 

        Use the following instead: urlFragment().removeParameter(parameterName);

        Removes the given URL fragment parameter by adding a JavaScript to the current AjaxRequestTarget.
        Parameters:
        parameterName - the name of your URL fragment parameter to set
